revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR841ND |revision=v5.x |series=N300 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=07/2010 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR841NXV5 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.85 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.2 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.3 |pwr_barrel_len=9 |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7240 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q32BVSIG |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S56D40FTP-G5 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9283 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=yes |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[0-9A-F]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=D8:5D:4C |oui_eth=D8:5D:4C }} ''300Mbps Wireless N Router''
[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=238&model=TL-WR841ND Support page] The FCC ID is not valid. Appears to be a AR7240 + AR9283 ([http://techbbs.zol.com.cn/1/47_6219.html source], [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=104080 source2], [http://5i01.com/topicdetail.php?f=110&t=1455242&p=2 source3], [http://itbbs.pconline.com.cn/network/12654721.html source4 - table]) device. The default SSID is 'TP-LINK_XXXXXX' where 'XXXXXX' is the last three octets of the wireless interface MAC address (uppercase letters). [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=74112 On the DD-WRT forums]
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr841nd On the OpenWrt Wiki]
{{TechInfoDepot|TP-Link_TL-WR841ND_5.x}} The power supply included with the unit is a '''Leader Electronics''' MU08-6090085-A1 (9V, 850mA). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ==Images== File:TP-LINK TL-WR841ND v5.5 board top.jpg|board top File:TP-LINK TL-WR841ND v5.5 board bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]]
